about_the_game:
Helios Hotel: The Night Shift will be a game broken into five chapters. The demo is chapter one and is essentially the game's tutorial, introducing the core mechanics of the game, as well as the story.

Rose has just moved to a small town ready to start a new life. Luckily, she quickly found a job as a receptionist at the Helios Hotel, the fancy new hotel in town. Her first day proves working at the Helios Hotel isn't quite what she was expecting.



This is a short indie horror game broken down into chapters. Play as Rose and perform the functions of the hotel receptionist while uncovering a strange occurrence that begins to unfold more and more each night.
